subtopic_documentation.readme: Scikit-learn is a machine learning library in Python that supports various supervised learning algorithms like decision trees, support vector machines, and linear models...
This library includes unsupervised learning methods such as clustering (k-means, DBSCAN) and dimensionality reduction (PCA, t-SNE)...
A collection of datasets used in regression modeling tutorials, helpful for building, testing, and evaluating regression models...
TensorFlow Models provides sample models for image and text classification tasks using neural networks...
Keras is a high-level neural networks API that supports fast experimentation with deep learning models in TensorFlow...
Scikit-learn includes tools for evaluating model performance such as cross-validation, precision/recall scoring, ROC curves, and confusion matrices...
